content.label: Please update this

One of my favorite tower defenses I've ever played on an apple device. It's truly a shame that the developer hasn't updated it to work on the latest ios. I'd pay money to be able to replay it again. Alas, this game will have to live on in my memories only

This was a great game to play on an iPhone or iPad. I rate the game itself 5, but the app developer 1. They have not updated this game to work with iOS 11 and my email to their support team went unanswered. I would expect a little more from a company that gladly took my money for the game. The other release of Sentinel - Dark Star did see an update for iOS 11 and while that game is good also there are mechanics of Sentinel 3 that I wish I could play again. Please update this app!!!
Please update to work with iOS 11

Out of all of the games in the series, I still like this game the most. It has an second campaign that is as large as the main campaign and adds even more weapons and ship powers. On top of that, two very unique commanders built for different situations. While the graphics may not be next gen, they are still serviceable and does not detract from the game, in my opinion. I just wish this was updated to the newest IOS version so I can play this alongside Sentinel 4 (second favorite).
Purchased recently after enjoying 4 but after updating to ios 11 it won‚Äôt open. Website says universal support on iPad, etc but incorrect. Would like an update or refund.
I loved this game, along with the first two games but now that they are not up to date I can‚Äôt play them on the IOS11. Can you please update them to operate on 11! I miss playing them!
Updated to iOS 11 and now game doesn‚Äôt work. No word from developer if it will update. It‚Äôs a shame as it was a great game. Too bad developers don‚Äôt care as much about the current client base.
Need to update to work on iOS 11!!!
Pls update the app in ios 11
Will no longer work on current iOS 11. Please fix this.
Great game but very disappointed. Paid a lot of money for upgrades now I can't enjoy the game total rip off this is literally robbery plain and simple.
Trying to move my turrets around and the screen freezes. If you could fix that, that would be great. :) Love the game, otherwise!!! Meow!
Please update this to 64 bit!

I love this game but it stopped working after the update. I can't place defenses. They get stuck on the lower left part of the screen. I have tried to fix by deleting and reloading but to no avail. Please fix!

Likable game, but when having completed level 1 and had played 2 boards on level 2, I could not continue without a purchase. A bit disgusted, I deleted the whole game and will avoid buying from this developer again.
It's worth it

title.label: Why are you asking me to buy AGAIN?!?

content.label: I've purchased Sentinel 2, 3 and 4.  Now I am being asked to purchase the Sentinel 3 endless campaigns AGAIN!  Why?  Please fix this.
I own Sentinel 1, 2 and 3.  Each game is fun in their own right!  They are some of my favorite TD games!  KUDOS!

Wanted to replay this game but when I reinstalled it I couldn't restore thee extra campaign. 
Update. You can restore purchases by trying to buy the campaign again. Just be sure the log in info is the same and you won't be charged. Excellent game.

I bought the second campaign when I originally played. I deleted the game when I was done, of course, for space. I wanted to play again two years later...looks like I have to purchase campaign 2 AGAIN. Indeed, any time I want to play it after the game has been deleted. This is the case even if you have to delete the game due to bugs. Would give it zero stars if possible because this is unacceptable. Gameplay is great, so this is sad.

Purchased based on positive reviews, so guess expected more. Simple birds eye view, purchased in app purchase but failed to load, various levels are all very similar so quickly monotonous. Plus is that it is well thought out TD game like bloons and kingdom rush but not as well developed. Deleted after about a month of play.
Solid game, with strong replay value
You guys made a amazing game!
Awesome after first five levels
Great game, but where is 4

This is an all time classic for TD games on iOS. Great strategy, graphics, and fun. 
I can't wait for Homeworld, but it's looking like they won't ever release it? Early 2013 was the expectation they set, and now in early 2014 still nothing. They don't even answer emails. Pretty discouraging. Still a good game anyway.
LOVE THE GAME!!!!!! BEST TD EVER BUT WHERE'S PART 4 AT?????????

Loved the first 2 and this is bigger and better. Best TD game in the app store. Worth the money. Works great on my 3GS.

Update: so I've beaten the game now , love it. Very addicting. One small problem though, when I upgrade a tower to the max it will pause the game for a few seconds. Not a huge deal but it is a little annoying. Other then that this game is exactly what I want in a TD game. Bring on number 4.

Update: so I've noticed you changed "coming 2013" to "in development" for number 4. Kinda disappointing since I waited all year for it.

GREAT TD GAMEüòç
CANT WAIT FOR SENTINEL 4üò±üòçüò±üòçüò±üòç
Good game.  Plenty of different challenges and weaponry to keep things lively! The in app purchases are reasonable at .99 cents each.  Highly recommend if you like the defend-a-fort type game genres!
Where the f$&k is dark star? 2013 came and went.
This game, and all of the Sentinel games, are a blast to play.

I love this game very I've played since sentinel 1
Plz launch episode 4, I will wait for you! Don't give up!

Company refuses to make the game fit iPhone 5 resolution.  Update crash makes you reinstall and then all in game purchases are not retrievable.  After a long 3 game dedicated customer this lack of support makes me fish else ware to spend my money
Yep

Super simple concept, with graphics that are interesting but not jaw dropping.  And yet I find myself playing it for 2-3 hours at a time, especially on airplanes. Ridiculously engaging, fun, and addictive.  Love it.
Won't even finish this game. Not great for a td game.
Where the hell is part 4?!
I don't play many games but I love this one

I paid for the second campaign add-on and it accepted my payment but freezes at the "contacting store" screen after taking my password and money...this is bull...I just gave you guys $2 for nothing...FIX IT!!!
Fun game to pass the day away or part of it anyway.
Great game, but I don't get the purpose of the little speed reading tests between each round...
Might be the best TD game I have ever played to date. Just don't put any lame tricks or shams into your updates.
Love this app
I am very much enjoying this game.  I am near the end but so far so good!
Keep fighting

I love this game; it's not as DIFFICULT as Field Runners 2, but that's good to me because FR2 had insane puzzles that you need to solve just to win a game. Some are complaining there's no HD update.  But, it already looks awesome on my ipad 4. the only thing I hate is that any STANDARD weapon does NOTHING on the boss levels-- even if you were to have multiple standard weapons positioned on a map.  That's not really fair.  But, the game is too addictive to complain too much.  LOL.  This game has not crashed at all. I love it!

I've enjoyed this tower defense game.  In the end I stopped playing when I hit a level in the campaign where medium difficulty was far too hard, but easy was laughably simple to beat.  I'd like to see more play speed options.  Normal is too slow.  Fast can sometimes be too fast, but is often not fast enough (especially on easy).
Best looking tower defense game I've played.
